content: this legal text provides an overview of the progress of a legal case without revealing the names of the parties involved the case involves the division of an inheritance and is regulated by an article that specifies how the assets should be divided among the coheirs the document mentions two important dates february 19 2015 and february 19 2016 which likely mark significant milestones in the case during a meeting on february 19 2016 both parties represented by their lawyers agreed to settle the case through mediation they reached a conciliation agreement that determined how the assets would be divided as well as the time and cost of execution the value of the conciliation agreement was €12050000 the mediator declared the mediation concluded and stated that each party would need to pay mediation fees amounting to €116934 per party the document was signed and closed on february 19 2016 in naples
